about_the_game:
The Path of Kami Journey Begins Lore Book is a PDF that features the background story, scripts, and notes from the team that allows you to take a peek behind the scenes of the development process and story evolution of Path of Kami. The document outlines the plot synopsis, narrative themes and goals, dialogue, collectible descriptions, and more!

Note: Please keep in mind that reading this means spoilers ahead, so be careful! It is recommended to view the contents of this pack only after completing the game.
